sakura.config.bambooshot_weight.tooltip: Changes generate rate of BambooShot. Increase value to gen more BambooShot.
sakura.config.pepper_weight.tooltip: Changes generate rate of Pepper. Increase value to gen more Pepper.

sakura.katana.wrong_duel_shinai: You must hold a Shinai with BOTH hands.
